Date.description: 可控数据更新时触发的回调函数

DateTime.type: (current: number) => { isHourDisabled: boolean, isMinuteDisabled: boolean, isSecondDisabled: boolean }

DateRange.name: actions
DateRange.description: DateRange 类型的 Date Picker 中支持的用户操作

DateRange.name: default-calendar-start-time
DateRange.description: 面板日历默认开始的月份时间戳

DateRange.name: default-calendar-end-time
DateRange.description: 面板日历默认结束的月份时间戳

DateRange.name: format
DateRange.description: 时间格式化字符串，详情见 [format](https://date-fns.org/v2.23.0/docs/format)

DateRange.name: is-date-disabled
DateRange.type: (current: number, phase: start | end, value: [number, number] | null) => boolean

DateRange.name: is-time-disabled
DateRange.description: 时间禁用的校验函数，校验函数中的 `null` 表示当前没有选中值
DateRange.type: (current: number, phase: start | end, value: [number, number]) => { isHourDisabled?: (hour: number) => boolean, isMinuteDisabled?: (minute: number, hour: number | null) => boolean, isSecondDisabled?: (second: number, minute: number | null, hour: number | null) => boolean }

DateRange.name: close-on-select
DateRange.description: 用户选择时间范围后是否自动关闭面板

DateRange.name: separator
DateRange.description: start 选框与 end 选框之间的分隔符

DateRange.name: start-placeholder
DateRange.description: DateRange 中 start 选框的提示信息

DateRange.name: update-value-on-close
DateRange.description: 关闭面板时是否更新值

DateRange.name: on-update:formatted-value
DateRange.description: 数据更新时触发的回调函数
DateRange.type: (value: [string, string] | null, timestampValue: [number, number] | null) => void

DateRange.name: on-update:value
DateRange.description: 数据更新时触发的回调函数
DateRange.type: (value: [number, number] | null, formattedValue: [string, string] | null) => void
